properties.displayName: IE ZoneMap Setting Downgraded To MyComputer Zone For HTTP Protocols Via CLI
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Internet Settings\\ZoneMap\\ProtocolDefaults" and ProcessCommandLine contains "http" and ProcessCommandLine contains " 0"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects changes to Internet Explorer's (IE / Windows Internet properties) ZoneMap configuration of the "HTTP" and "HTTPS" protocols to point to the "My Computer" zone. This allows downloaded files from the Internet to be granted the same level of trust a
